title: Sigh
review: I was really looking forward to this film - being a fan of the original. The pacing is completely off and the plot isn't particularly interesting. The only appeal is the costumes, set designs and CGI.

title: Average
review: I'm not a hater of this film, I just didn't think it was that good. Maybe it was the casting. I feel like Edward Norton wasn't the ideal choice.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
title: Mediocre
review: This film was quite mediocre. It did not revive the series at all, even though it was a prequel. The acting and writing were poor. Not compelling to watch at all.

title: Loved it!
review: This was a fun film to watch, with some very tense moments. I was shocked to find out later it's based on a true story!

title: Ok
review: It was ok but overly sentimental and not at all as good as the book. I think it was decent and plucked those emotional strings at the right time. Wouldn't watch it again. Would rather get the book out.

title: Mediocre
review: It wasn't terrible but I'm finding a lot of the newer superhero films just haven't done justice to the originals. The score and CGI were the main appeals. The pacing was slow and the villain was not compelling.

title: Classic film
review: This film is disturbing even in the modern times. A tough watch. I can see how it was controversial at the time yet films like this now are standard fare! It's still chilling to watch even now.

title: Best film of the 90s
review: I loved this film. I've watched it 10 times and cry each time. It really takes you back to the 90s through its writing style and cinematography then you're transported back to the beginning of the 20th century to a tragedy that will be forever remembered.

title: Great film
review: Loved the soundtrack, the acting was on point. Really glad to see African Americans at the forefront of a superhero film

movie_title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
title: Average
review: I watched this on the plane and glad I spent my time on the plane watching this film. If i'd watched it at the cinema I would have felt ripped off. The plot, acting and pacing are just not right. Of course plenty of CGI and action scene to keep the superhero flick fan interested.

title: What happened to Keanu?
review: This film was awesome! Definitely one of those cult classics that will stick with you for the rest of your life. Such a unique premise and such a suspenseful film.

title: Fun but not perfect
review: The humour in this superhero action flick is a bit hit and miss. Overall it was a fun watch but some very cliched moments.

title: Decent
review: I dont know that it deserved an Oscar, but I did enjoy watching it. The Bollywood cast did a fine job - moreso than the English sourced cast. Dev Patel did a decent job.

title: Haven't seen the originals
review: So I've assessed this as a standalone film. I just loved it! The action sequences were amazing. It's an adrenaline rush from start to finish. The cinematography and CGI where it was used was amazing. Visually and aurally a great film.

title: Not great, not bad.
review: I have to say, this film should probably not have been made. It's just not as good as the original films. It tries to revive a franchise as so many other films in its wake have failed to do. But it was watchable.

title: Great film
review: I wish they'd make a sequel to this. Portman and Weaving do a fine job bringing this vigilante flick to life.
